storyInfo: The Durins vote to demolish the Great Aquapit, and Stitch and Catch the design representative decide to hold a contest to determine who will design the next Zeruertzan landmark that will be built alongside the railroad bridge.

attributes.content: Hey, have you heard the bombastic news?
attributes.name: Excited Durin

attributes.content: Which?
attributes.name: Eager Durin

attributes.content: Croque said the leaders are talking about putting together something new!
attributes.name: Excited Durin

attributes.content: Ugh, that plan to turn all the lights in the city green? Can't say I'm a fan.
attributes.name: Eager Durin

attributes.content: Not that one! The one about the slide!
attributes.name: Excited Durin

attributes.content: I heard Stitch and Catch are having a huge row over the Great Aquapit's refurbishment plans!
attributes.name: Excited Durin

attributes.content: The two of them?! How far are they into their debate?
attributes.name: Eager Durin

attributes.content: Uhh, I think now they'll use water cannons to blast people into another cannon, and then into another one... something like that?
attributes.name: Excited Durin

attributes.content: Absolutely not!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Let's try a different idea, then. We'll use the water cannons to hurl people up to the springboards high above...
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Don't you have any ideas that don't involve water cannons?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: But it's a brilliant epiphany, and you were the one who inspired me! Well, in that case, do you have any bright ideas, Stitch the amazing architectural designer?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Ugh... I was just going to be the lead architectural designer and dial down Acahuallans' plans a little.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: You had the surface-dwellers come to help with the bridge. I have no problem with that. But now we're discussing the thing that will go on top of the bridge and live alongside it, the landmark of Zeruertza!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: You don't want to work on the dome with me. Fine, I get how you feel about the dome. Then let's talk about what will be our next landmark after the big water slide.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: There's a much simpler and more graceful way to solve this. It could be brimming with symbolism!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: It could be more exciting!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: It could be more exciting and brimming with symbolism!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Phew, Catch, arguing about this here isn't going to get us anywhere. How about we have a design competition? We'll give each other some time to work on a design and let the citizens of Zeruertza decide.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Of course. Just like all those years ago.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: I'm on board too—
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Croque? Are you drinking?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: I'm fine. I only had a tiny little bit.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: You emptied three whole barrels by yourself.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Stitch, I heard your proposal. I'm interested.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: And if Catch is up for it, then that's all the better!
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Now we just need to find Deculture, and we'll build something new for Zeruertza!
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: You mean... I should change how I treat them...
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Don't you think they're cute?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: It's true that they are nowhere close to what you'd call 'human.' I'm no doctor, but even so, I know that humans are way more complex than the machines we have these days.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: But that doesn't mean we can't get along with them like friends and family.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Deculture, you're these a 'parent' to these little guys.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Parent, huh...?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: They count on you and trust you, just like newly hatched fowlbeasts growing under their mothers' wings.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: For the longest time, I've really only seen them in... an indifferent light. All I ever do is what an industrial representative should, the same thing that all the industrial representatives before me did.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: We pick our robot managers from the Durins who hang out in the robotics section of the library. We have to master how to create these little things.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: It's not actually that complicated. All we have to do is follow the books' instructions and put together the parts that we like... use our imaginations, and they always work without fail.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: My teacher spent years trying to figure out the logic behind them, but he came up empty-handed.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: From what I heard, my teacher's teacher also researched it, and it's thanks to her that the assistant robots can tell jokes.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Do you know how to make a Durin angry? Nobody knows! Hahaha.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Oh, that's amazing.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: As for me, all I'm doing is taking their abilities for granted. You're right. I should try to actually get along with them.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: 0429, your fellow robot 0428 has been retired. Inspection will not reawaken it.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: But that doesn't change that it was one of us. The things that it built will last.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Retirement isn't the end.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Instruction acknowledged. Retirement is not the end. Understood.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Relationship defined with Zumama: friend. Deculture, I would like us to be defined as friends.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Friends. Right, friends. We can get along like that.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: 0429, did you know? Friends are supposed to help each other.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Before, I used to order you to do everything that I couldn't be bothered to handle myself...
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: But now I'm thinking that's not how this should be. We should be on equal footing with one another.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: From here on out, I will ask you to help me with my tasks, as a friend.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Acknowledged. Help friend.
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: 0429, please—
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Send three cases of ale to my place, and bring some snacks while you are at it. After that, please let Master Edge know that I won't be attending today's representative meeting because I'll be sleeping.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: That doesn't seem quite right...
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Zumama!
Hey, Gavial, you're here!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: This is my new friend, Assistant Robot #0429, and its terrible boss, Deculture.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Deculture, meeting invitation, all representatives—
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: 0429, change of plans. As your friend, I'm asking you to do me this favor. Go to that meeting for me.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Help friend. Help friend!
attributes.name: Strange Machine #0429

attributes.content: Do it yourself!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Speaking of which, what was our last meeting with everyone in attendance for?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Alcohol was in short supply, so we had a meeting to figure out how to solve the supply chain issues.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Have we ever run low on alcohol?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: You skipped that meeting.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Hahaha, this brings me back. The mead fans wanted to make sure the whiskey lovers had nothing to drink, so they bought out all the whiskey in town.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: And to get back at the mead fans, the Whiskey Enthusiasts' Association started buying up mead by the lot too.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: These drunkards can survive without booze?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Of course not. That's why they started drinking the booze they bought to get at the other side.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: I understand both clubs lost some members to the other side around that time, haha!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: It's a shame, though. If only they had an appreciation for berry tomato wine.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Catch, you... so that's your poison?
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Yeah, what's the matter?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: No wonder none of the alcohol fan clubs accepted you...
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Well... Never mind, so we're all gathered today to discuss the 'Great Aquapit...'
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Tear it down? Yeah, I agree, and the sooner the better.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: I'm a yea, too.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: I thought you two loved that place! Hell, you go multiple times a week, Croque!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Right, and I'm regretting my patronage. I can't believe I spent so much time in a facility built by a guy who likes berry tomato wine... It's a disgrace.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: How negligent I must have been as the industrial representative to participate in a project led by a man like that.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: What is that supposed to mean?! Hey, Master Edge, what's with that look?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Haha, berry tomato wine... That's a little...
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: If you've reached an understanding, then we'll call everyone out to blow up that showy water slide, fix the railroads, and solve all of Master Edge's problems. That's the plan. Any objections?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: It's a shame, but an architect can't let his past work tie him down. This is a chance to once again put my talents to good use.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Stitch, you said you'd have a design contest with Catch over Zeruertza's new landmark. You are serious about that, aren't you?
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Oh? Finally going to amaze us with your designs again?
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Well, with all of you here singing my praises, what choice do I have?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Looks like we're in for a fun couple of months. I should stock up on booze.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Seriously, Master Edge, why don't you try some berry tomato wine? It really isn't as bad as it sounds.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Not in a million years.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: And that's the end of the voting!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Well, then. Per consensus, this is it for the Great Aquapit, and we will repair the railroad bridge and build a new landmark for Zeruertza at the same time!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Hell yeah! I've been getting tired of the slide anyway!
attributes.name: Cheering Durin

attributes.content: The new plan better be something totally different! I heard we're getting a roller coaster?
attributes.name: Imaginative Durin

attributes.content: Water coaster!
attributes.name: Cheering Durin

attributes.content: Looping water coaster!
attributes.name: Imaginative Durin

attributes.content: A catapult looping water coaster! With a super water cannon! And a racetrack for self-driving carts!
attributes.name: Cheering Durin

attributes.content: Stitch and I will each submit an independent design proposal, and we'll call another meeting to decide which proposal to move forward with.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Stitch? Stitch who lives in the cube?
attributes.name: Cheering Durin

attributes.content: Hm, I saw a design of his a few years ago... It wasn't much fun, but it had a unique sense of beauty...
attributes.name: Imaginative Durin

attributes.content: Maybe we can come up with some new way to have fun there. I mean, that place is pretty much an open space, and the important thing is what we can do with it!
attributes.name: Cheering Durin

attributes.content: It kind of feels like Stitch's building would be a good place to lie down and relax—
attributes.name: Imaginative Durin

attributes.content: Just like that super relaxing Gaulish meditation I saw in 'Stranger Things!'
attributes.name: Cheering Durin

attributes.content: Hm, I think I can work with that.
attributes.name: Imaginative Durin

attributes.content: Phew, looks like everything went off without a hitch? Not that we actually did anything.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But we did see a hard, bitter negotiation play out. Isn't that right, Croque?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Edge! Drink up, old man! What, are you keeping fins in your cup?!
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: *cough*! I'm trying to take a short break!
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: We've done a lot, Gavial! We went shopping and bought a lot of stuff and had a decent vacation. Plus, we even helped score a huge project for Acahualla!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: And you also made a mess of my feelings.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Oh, don't say that. I thought we made friends.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes, it went much more smoothly than I expected.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: That just goes to show that you could've done it yourself, you punk.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But, what's next...?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: That's a funny look on your face.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: It's been a while since I've worked on anything, so I'm feeling a little...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Phew... It's okay. I just have to warm up.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Once I get myself back into the game, surely—
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas
